exceptions.exn: In environment x, y : R p, q : Z H1 : x = fst (ucp p q) /\\ y = snd (ucp p q) \\/ x = snd (ucp p q) /\\ y = fst (ucp p q) H2 : cond_pqb p q H3 : distinct_parity p q Unable to unify "x = fst (ucp p q) /\\ y = snd (ucp p q) \\/ x = snd (ucp p q) /\\ y = fst (ucp p q)" with "x = fst (ucp p q)".
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

In environment x, y : R p, q : Z H1 : x = fst (ucp p q) /\\ y = snd (ucp p q) \\/ x = snd (ucp p q) /\\ y = fst (ucp p q) H2 : cond_pqb p q H3 : distinct_parity p q Unable to unify "cond_pqb p q" with "y = snd (ucp p q)".
Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

In environment x, y : R p, q : Z H1 : x = fst (ucp p q) /\\ y = snd (ucp p q) \\/ x = snd (ucp p q) /\\ y = fst (ucp p q) H2 : cond_pqb p q H3 : distinct_parity p q Unable to unify "distinct_parity p q" with "cond_pqb p q".

original: intros x y H. unfold in_ucp_set in H. unfold in_ucp_setb. destruct H as [p [q [H1 [H2 H3]]]]. exists p, q. split. - apply H1. - split. + apply H2. + apply H3.
